2020-2021 OFF-SEASON

In the summer before the 2020-2021 season, we competed in the Onshape Robots to the Rescue competition, where all teams were supposed to CAD a robot that helps solve a major world crisis. Our team preferred to select the crisis of the inefficient arrangement of distributing medications to patients in hospitals. We collaborated with Team Apollo to form an alliance, in which they would target sanitizing our delivery robot. 151 teams took part in this competition from which our team placed #32. Considering this was the first time CAD-ing for most of us, this ranking was impressive, and we learned a lot from this experience! Our team will continue learning to use CAD to design our robot, and we look forward to what we can do with it in the future!
